Neji jumps into the air while Lee wraps him in his bandages. At the same time Lee performs the Front Lotus, Neji releases [[chakra]] from his entire [[tenketsu|body]]. The spinning that occurs in the Front Lotus substitutes for the rotation involved in the Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven technique.
